name: Discover hidden places in Jimbaran- Pecatu- Nusa Dua Area
description: You will get a new style of traveling, driving in hardcore roads, find hidden beach and the most impossible beach in Bali (even some locals still don't know how to get there). You'll definitely be pampered by either spicy local food or cheap-tasty Chinese food. You'll gaze at the sunset at the cliff and drink beer until dawn. I will pick you up and drop you back at the meeting point.
